official_title: A bill to authorize new powers for depository institutions.

summary.text: Financial Institutions Competition Act - Amends the Investment Company Act of 1940 to permit a bank, a bank holding company or a subsidiary thereof, a savings and loan association, a savings bank, or a credit union to: (1) organize, sponsor, operate, control, or render investment advice to an investment company; or (2) underwrite, distribute, sell, or issue securities of any investment company if certain standards are met. Sets forth procedures to insure compliance with such standards.

titles.title: A bill to authorize new powers for depository institutions.
